body_content.explanation: to add a short explanation or opinion to a text or image:
examples: Annotated editions of Shakespeare's plays help readers to understand old words.
His great-granddaughter has painstakingly transcribed and annotated his wartime diaries.
The students annotate their photos, saying why they are relevant.

body_content.explanation: to add a description or piece of information to data, for example a label saying whether a word is a noun, a verb, etc.:
examples: After the corpus was collected we annotated it.
Textual or numerical data can be copied into databases, annotated, and linked to other data.
